description: South African FICA compliance checklist for company and entity clients. Covers company registration, director verification, address, source of funds, and risk assessment.

items.name: Verify company registration
items.description: Verify the company's registration with CIPC. Obtain the company registration certificate.

items.name: Verify directors/members
items.description: Verify the identity of all directors, members, or beneficial owners with at least 25% ownership.
items.requiredDocumentLabel: List of directors and ID documents

items.name: Verify registered address
items.description: Verify the company's registered business address.

items.name: Confirm source of funds
items.description: Obtain documentation confirming the company's source of business funds.

items.name: Perform risk assessment
items.description: Classify the entity's risk rating based on FICA risk matrix. Depends on registration verification.

items.name: FICA compliance sign-off
items.description: Senior compliance officer signs off on FICA compliance for this entity.
